definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: The mayor gave away the prizes at the school sports.
sentences.chinese: 市长在校运会上颁发了奖品。

sentences.english: Athletic meets next week, this week to strengthen the training.
sentences.chinese: 下星期校运会，这星期要加强训练。

sentences.english: Shanxi province established colleges and sports in organizing the problems in the process.
sentences.chinese: 发现山西省本科院校校运会在举办过程中存在的问题。

sentences.english: The annual school sport meet is held in march.
sentences.chinese: 每年一次的校运会在三月份举行。

sentences.english: Today, our school sports meeting begin.
sentences.chinese: 今天，我们学校的校运会开始了。

sentences.english: Ask the students to talk about their school sports meeting.
sentences.chinese: 展示校运会的照片，让学生描述比赛的情景和结果。

sentences.english: We were holding school sports meeting at this time of last Monday.
sentences.chinese: 上周的这个时候，我们在举行校运会。

sentences.english: Qi Li will compete in three events of the school sports competition next week.
sentences.chinese: 李琪将在下周校运会中参加三个项目的比赛。

definition: military practice, esp. for reservists or new recruits/military training as a (sometimes compulsory) subject in schools and colleges/drill
anniversary of the founding of a school
setting-up exercises during the break (between classes)
